testimonials.title: Patient Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Real Results from Real People
testimonials.description: Hear from patients who have experienced life-changing transformations through our treatments

rekha.name: Rekha Sharma
rekha.quote: After 3 sessions of Agnikarma, my 10-year chronic knee pain completely disappeared. I can now climb stairs without any discomfort. Dr. Vishwamurthi's expertise is truly remarkable.

suresh.name: Suresh Patel
suresh.quote: The combination of Agnikarma and Panchakarma transformed my life. My sciatica pain that troubled me for 5 years is now completely gone. The treatment was gentle yet highly effective.

priya.name: Priya Desai
priya.quote: My 7-year-old son showed remarkable improvement after Viddhakarma treatment. His communication skills improved significantly, and he became more social. We are grateful for this miracle.

about.title: About Shri Vishwamurthi Ayurvedalay
about.subtitle: Bridging Ancient Wisdom with Modern Healthcare
about.description: For over two decades, we have been dedicated to providing authentic Ayurvedic treatments that heal not just the body, but the mind and soul. Our journey is one of continuous learning, innovation, and unwavering commitment to patient wellness.

2003.description: Started with a vision to bring authentic Ayurveda to modern healthcare

2008.description: Received official certification as registered Ayurvedic hospital

2015.description: Became recognized center for Ayurvedic education and research

2018.description: Reached milestone of treating over 1000 patients successfully

2020.description: Launched telemedicine and digital health monitoring systems

2023.description: Celebrated 5000+ successful treatments and patient transformations

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide authentic, effective, and accessible Ayurvedic healthcare that transforms lives through the perfect blend of ancient wisdom and modern medical practices.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading center for Ayurvedic excellence, setting new standards in holistic healthcare and making traditional healing accessible to all.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We stay true to traditional Ayurvedic principles while embracing modern innovations

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: Every patient receives personalized care with empathy and understanding

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards in treatment quality and patient outcomes

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Transparent practices and honest communication in all our interactions

compassionateCare.title: Compassionate Care
compassionateCare.description: Every patient is treated with love, respect, and individual attention

authenticAyurveda.title: Authentic Ayurveda
authenticAyurveda.description: Traditional methods preserved and practiced in their purest form

scientificApproach.title: Scientific Approach
scientificApproach.description: Ancient wisdom validated through modern research and evidence

holisticHealing.title: Holistic Healing
holisticHealing.description: Treating the root cause for complete mind-body-soul wellness
